descriptionHtml:
[size=4]STANDALONE MOD[/size]
- no other mods are required
- armor is not included

UPDATE: New version of Kumiho has been added:

[center] [img]http://www.kephost.com/images4/2014/3/20/a1_2014_3_20_25n7kq9ney.jpg[/img] [/center]

[color=#21cad5]KUMIHO[/color]

[color=#54beba]Location:[/color] Warmaiden's - Whiterun

[color=#54beba]CLASS:[/color] Rogue

[color=#54beba]Flags:[/color] Essential, Marriageable

[color=#54beba]Skills[/color]

- One-Handed
- Marksman
- Light Armor
- Sneak

Kumiho is a stealthy, assassin-type follower requested by blu377.
Since the Nexus lacks of asian followers i decided to make his request come live.

Kumiho is a nine tailed fox in the Korean myth, but she appears in Japanese and Chinese legends as well.
According to those tales, a fox that lives a thousand years turns into a kumiho. It can freely transform, among other things, into a beautiful woman often set out to seduce boys, and eat their liver or heart (depending on the legend).

Thats the reason why she wears a kumiho tattoo on her face.

Feel free to add your pics, i like seeing them!



[color=#ce2d29][size=4][b]CREDITS:[/b][/size][/color]


Bethesda for Skyrim

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair[/url] by apachii

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/?]SG Female Eyebrows[/url] by HelloSanta
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes Of Beauty[/url] by LogRaam
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Calientes Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE[/url] by Caliente
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14539/?]Flans Eyes for Skyrim[/url] by DarNilavu
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url] by dimon99

Special thanks to [color=#f694d0]NewSea[/color], an amazing creator for Sims hairs, who finally replied to my emails and gave me permisson to use the beautiful sims hairs converted by HelloSanta.
Link to NewSea's homepage in ReadMe.

Thank you for your great works and permissions!

Recommended mod: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14205/?]Calyps Animal Ears[/url] by calyps
